languages.text: {n}Сенешаль грозно рявкает:{/n} "Именем династии приказываю отступить от края и объясниться, что за злодеяние ты задумал свершить!"
{n}Abelard barks out,{/n} "In the name of the dynasty, I command you to step away from the edge and explain the misdeed you were about to commit!"
languages.original_text: {n}Сенешаль грозно рявкает:{/n} "Именем династии приказываю отступить от края и объясниться, что за злодеяние ты задумал свершить!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard barks out:{/n} "In the name of the dynasty, I command you to step away from the edge and explain what misdeed you were about to commit!"
{n}Abelard barks out:{/n} "In the name of the dynasty, I command you to step away from the edge and explain what misdeed you were about to commit!"

{n}Abelard barks out,{/n} "In the name of the dynasty, I command you to step away from the edge and explain the misdeed you were about to commit!"
{n}Abelard barks out,{/n} "In the name of the dynasty, I command you to step away from the edge and explain the misdeed you were about to commit!"

languages.text: {n}Abélard aboie :{/n} « Au nom de la dynastie, je vous ordonne de vous éloigner du bord et d'expliquer l'atrocité que vous vous apprêtiez à commettre ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard barks out,{/n} "In the name of the dynasty, I command you to step away from the edge and explain the misdeed you were about to commit!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard aboie :{/n} « Au nom de la dynastie, je vous ordonne de vous éloigner du bord et d'expliquer l'atrocité que tu t'apprêtais à commettre ! »

languages.text: {n}Abelard exclama:{/n} «¡En nombre de la dinastía, le conmino a apartarse de las vías y dar explicaciones por el disparate que estaba a punto de cometer!».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard barks out,{/n} "In the name of the dynasty, I command you to step away from the edge and explain the misdeed you were about to commit!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard exclama:{/n} «¡En nombre de la dinastía, le conmino a apartarse de las vías y dar explicaciones por el disparate que estaba a punto de cometer!».

languages.text: {n}アベラルドが大声を上げる。{/n}「王朝の名において、端から離れて犯そうとしていた悪行の説明を求める！」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard barks out,{/n} "In the name of the dynasty, I command you to step away from the edge and explain the misdeed you were about to commit!"

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドが大声を上げる。{/n}「王朝の名において、端から離れて犯そうとしていた悪行の説明を求める！」

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德高喊起来。{/n}“以王朝的名义，我命令你离开那个地方！立刻解释你刚刚打算犯下的罪行！”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard barks out,{/n} "In the name of the dynasty, I command you to step away from the edge and explain the misdeed you were about to commit!"

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德高喊起来。{/n}“以王朝的名义，我命令你离开那个地方！立刻解释你刚刚打算犯下的罪行！”

languages.text: {n}Abelard bellt ihn an:{/n} "Im Namen der Dynastie, ich befehle Euch, zurückzutreten und zu erklären, was Ihr da vorhattet!"
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard barks out,{/n} "In the name of the dynasty, I command you to step away from the edge and explain the misdeed you were about to commit!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard bellt ihn an:{/n} "Im Namen der Dynastie, ich befehle Euch, zurückzutreten und zu erklären, was Ihr da vorhattet!"

languages.text: {n}Abelard haykırmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Hanedanlık adına oradan uzaklaşmanı ve işlemek üzere olduğun suçun hesabını vermeni emrediyorum!"
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard barks out,{/n} "In the name of the dynasty, I command you to step away from the edge and explain the misdeed you were about to commit!"
